participant_1.background:
I am looking for a new home that is pet-friendly and close to my work.
I'm a vet student, so I can help animals and use my math and science skills in a career that I love.
i am witty.
I'm going to spend time with my family and friends.
I start my day with a healthy breakfast of organic granola and fruit.

participant_2.background:
I don't like sports, but I enjoy long walks in the park on the weekend.
I moved to a new city to escape the judgemental people in my hometown.
I am excited to start a new chapter of my life with my fiance.
I'm a clumsy blonde, but my dog loves me anyway.
I have a brother and sister, but I'm closer to my brother.

content.text: Hi there, how are you today?
Hi! I'm doing well. I just moved to a new city and I'm really excited to start this new chapter in my life.
That's great! I hope you love it there. I'm a vet student, so I'm always looking for a new home that is pet-friendly and close to my work.
Oh, that's awesome! I love animals. I'm a clumsy blonde, but my dog loves me anyway.
That's great! I'm a witty person, so I'm sure we'll get along well.
I'm sure we will! I'm excited to meet new people in my new city.
Me too! What are your hobbies?
I love to go for long walks in the park on the weekend. I also enjoy reading and spending time with my family and friends.
Those sound like great hobbies! I love to read as well. I'm also a big fan of organic granola and fruit for breakfast.
Me too! I love a healthy breakfast to start my day.
It sounds like we have a lot in common. I'm excited to get to know you better!
